languages.text: Иеронимус Скорбный продолжал оставаться наиболее почитаемым священником церкви святого Друза в Просторе. Не брезгуя никем, он исповедовал пиратов, трюмных крыс, дезертиров и нищих. Вероятно, от кого-то из недостойных чад своих он и заразился редкой проказой, отчего утратил зрение. Но сердце его всегда видело грех в душах его кающихся чад.
languages.translation_comment: Иеронимус не был скоррапчен, не подвергся епитимье

languages.text: Hieronymus Doloroso remained the most revered priest in the Cult of Saint Drusus. He turned no one away, hearing confessions from pirates, bilge rats, deserters, and beggars alike. It might have been one of those undeserving wretches who infected him with the rare form of leprosy that robbed him of his sight. Yet his heart could always see the corruption in the souls of his repenting children.
languages.original_text: Иеронимус Скорбный продолжал оставаться наиболее почитаемым священником церкви святого Друза в Просторе. Не брезгуя никем, он исповедовал пиратов, трюмных крыс, дезертиров и нищих. Вероятно, от кого-то из недостойных чад своих он и заразился редкой проказой, отчего утратил зрение. Но сердце его всегда видело грех в душах его кающихся чад.

traits.locale_text: Hieronymus Doloroso remained the most revered priest of the Saint Drusus Church. Not shunning anyone, he listened to confessions from pirates, hold rats, deserters and beggars. It might have been one of those undeserving children who infected him with rare leprosy, to which he lost his sight. Yet his heart could always see the sin in the souls of his repenting children.

Yet his heart could always see the corruption in the souls of his repenting children.

Yet his heart could always see the corruption in the souls of his repenting children.

Yet his heart could always see the corruption in the souls of his repenting children.

It might have been one of those undeserving wretches who infected him with the rare form of leprosy that robbed him of his sight. languages.text: 希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索依然是圣德鲁苏斯教派最受尊敬的牧师。他聆听海盗、窃贼、逃兵和乞丐的忏悔，从不拒绝任何人。也许，其中某个卑贱之人将罕见的麻风病传染给了他，让他双目失明。但即便如此，他的心灵依然能看到那些悔改之人灵魂中潜藏的腐化。
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso remained the most revered priest in the Cult of Saint Drusus. He turned no one away, hearing confessions from pirates, bilge rats, deserters, and beggars alike. It might have been one of those undeserving wretches who infected him with the rare form of leprosy that robbed him of his sight. Yet his heart could always see the corruption in the souls of his repenting children.

traits.locale_text: 希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索依然是圣德鲁苏斯教派最受尊敬的牧师。他聆听海盗、窃贼、逃兵和乞丐的忏悔，从不拒绝任何人。也许，其中某个卑贱之人将罕见的麻风病传染给了他，让他双目失明。但即便如此，他的心灵依然能看到那些悔改之人灵魂中潜藏的腐化。

languages.text: Hieronymus Doloroso blieb der angesehenste Priester des Kults des Heiligen Drusus. Er schickte niemanden fort, nahm Piraten, Schmugglern, Deserteuren und Bettlern gleichermaßen die Beichte ab. Vielleicht war es einer dieser unwürdigen Würmer, der ihn mit einer seltenen Form der Lepra ansteckte. Der Priester erblindete daran. Sein Herz konnte weiterhin die Verderbnis in den Seelen seiner reumütigen Kinder sehen.
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso remained the most revered priest in the Cult of Saint Drusus. He turned no one away, hearing confessions from pirates, bilge rats, deserters, and beggars alike. It might have been one of those undeserving wretches who infected him with the rare form of leprosy that robbed him of his sight. Yet his heart could always see the corruption in the souls of his repenting children.

traits.locale_text: Hieronymus Doloroso blieb der angesehenste Priester der Kirche des Heiligen Drusus. Er schickte niemanden fort, nahm Piraten, Schmugglern, Deserteuren und Bettlern die Beichte ab. Vielleicht war es einer dieser unwürdigen Würmer, der ihn mit einer seltenen Form der Lepra ansteckte. Der Priester erblindete daran. Sein Herz konnte weiterhin die Verderbnis in den Seelen seiner reumütigen Kinder sehen.

languages.text: Hiéronymus Doloroso resta le prêtre le plus respecté du Culte de Saint Drusus. Il acceptait toutes les âmes affligées, recueillant les confessions des pirates, des rats de fond de cale, des déserteurs et des mendiants. C'est peut-être l'un de ces misérables qui lui transmit une forme rare de lèpre qui lui fit perdre la vue, mais son cœur était toujours capable de percevoir la corruption dans l'âme de ses enfants en quête de repentance.
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso remained the most revered priest in the Cult of Saint Drusus. He turned no one away, hearing confessions from pirates, bilge rats, deserters, and beggars alike. It might have been one of those undeserving wretches who infected him with the rare form of leprosy that robbed him of his sight. Yet his heart could always see the corruption in the souls of his repenting children.

traits.locale_text: Hiéronymus Doloroso resta le prêtre le plus respecté de l'Église de Saint Drusus. Il acceptait toutes les âmes affligées, recueillant les confessions des pirates, des rats de soute, des déserteurs et des mendiants. C'est peut-être l'un de ces misérables qui lui transmit une forme rare de lèpre qui lui fit perdre la vue, mais son cœur était toujours capable de percevoir la corruption dans l'âme de ses enfants en quête de repentance.

languages.text: Hieronymus Doloroso continuó siendo el sacerdote más reverenciado del Culto de San Drusus. No rechazó a nadie y escuchó las confesiones de piratas, ratas de bodega, desertores y mendigos. Tal vez fuera uno de esos desdichados indignos quien le transmitió una rara variante de la lepra que acabó por arrebatarle la vista. Aun así, su corazón siempre supo ver la corrupción en las almas de sus hijos arrepentidos.
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso remained the most revered priest in the Cult of Saint Drusus. He turned no one away, hearing confessions from pirates, bilge rats, deserters, and beggars alike. It might have been one of those undeserving wretches who infected him with the rare form of leprosy that robbed him of his sight. Yet his heart could always see the corruption in the souls of his repenting children.

traits.locale_text: Hieronymus Doloroso continuó siendo el sacerdote más reverenciado de la Iglesia de San Drusus. No rechazó a nadie y escuchó las confesiones de piratas, ratas de bodega, desertores y mendigos. Tal vez fuera uno de esos desdichados indignos quien le transmitió una rara variante de la lepra que acabó por arrebatarle la vista. Aun así, su corazón siempre supo ver la corrupción en las almas de sus hijos arrepentidos.

languages.text: ヒエロニムス・ドロローソは、聖ドルスス教団の司祭として誰よりも畏敬を集めつづけた。彼は来る者を決して拒まず、海賊や船倉のこそ泥、脱走兵、物乞いから懺悔を聞いた。そうした不釣り合いな輩の一人からだろうか、彼は稀有な種類の感染病を移され、それにより失明した。それでもヒエロニムスは、懺悔に訪れる神の子たちの魂の穢れを、必ず見抜くことができた。
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso remained the most revered priest in the Cult of Saint Drusus. He turned no one away, hearing confessions from pirates, bilge rats, deserters, and beggars alike. It might have been one of those undeserving wretches who infected him with the rare form of leprosy that robbed him of his sight. Yet his heart could always see the corruption in the souls of his repenting children.

traits.locale_text: ヒエロニムス・ドロローソは、聖ドルスス教団の司祭として誰よりも畏敬を集めつづけた。彼は来る者を決して拒まず、海賊や船倉のこそ泥、脱走兵、物乞いから懺悔を聞いた。そうした不釣り合いな輩の一人からだろうか、彼は稀有な種類の感染病を移され、それにより失明した。それでもヒエロニムスは、懺悔に訪れる神の子たちの魂の穢れを、必ず見抜くことができた。

languages.text: Hieronymus Doloroso, Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'ndaki en saygın din görevlisi olarak kaldı. Günah çıkaran korsanları, kalleşleri, kaçakları ve dilencileri dinleyip kimseyi geri çevirmedi. Ona nadir görülen bir cüzzam hastalığı bulaştırıp görme yetisinden mahrum bırakan da muhtemelen bu zavallılardan biriydi. Kalbiyse pişmanlık duyan çocuklarının ruhundaki yozlaşmayı her daim görmeyi sürdürdü.
languages.original_text: Hieronymus Doloroso remained the most revered priest in the Cult of Saint Drusus. He turned no one away, hearing confessions from pirates, bilge rats, deserters, and beggars alike. It might have been one of those undeserving wretches who infected him with the rare form of leprosy that robbed him of his sight. Yet his heart could always see the corruption in the souls of his repenting children.

traits.locale_text: Hieronymus Doloroso, Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'ndaki en saygı duyulan din görevlisi olarak kaldı. Korsanların, kalleşlerin, kaçakların ve dilencilerin günah çıkarmalarını dinledi ve kimseyi geri çevirmedi. Ona nadir görülen bir cüzzam hastalığı bulaştıran ve görme yetisini ondan alan da muhtemelen bu zavallılardan biriydi ancak kalbi, pişmanlık duyan çocuklarının ruhlarındaki yozlaşmayı her daim görebilmeye devam etti.

languages.translation_comment: Иеронимус не был скоррапчен, не подвергся епитимье
